description: [{'description': "The 2022 Mazda CX-5 GS is a well-rounded compact SUV that strikes an excellent balance between style, comfort, and performance. Positioned as a mid-tier trim in the CX-5 lineup, the GS model offers a range of features that enhance the driving experience without compromising on Mazda's signature design and driving dynamics. Under the hood, the CX-5 GS is powered by a 2.5-liter naturally aspirated inline-4 engine that produces 187 horsepower and 186 lb-ft of torque. This engine is paired with a 6-speed automatic transmission, delivering smooth shifts and responsive acceleration. The i-Activ all-wheel-drive system is standard on the 2022 model, providing enhanced traction and stability in various driving conditions, whether on wet roads or light off-road terrain. The exterior design of the CX-5 GS features Mazda's elegant Kodo design language, with a bold front grille, sleek LED headlights, and a sculpted body that exudes a sense of motion even when standing still. The 17-inch alloy wheels and subtle chrome accents add to the vehicle's refined appearance. Inside, the CX-5 GS offers a comfortable and well-crafted cabin with seating for five passengers. The interior is equipped with premium cloth upholstery, a leather-wrapped steering wheel, and heated front seats. The driver's seat is power-adjustable, making it easy to find the perfect driving position. The 10.25-inch infotainment display is controlled via a rotary dial and offers Apple CarPlay, Android Auto, Bluetooth connectivity, and a 6-speaker audio system. The CX-5 GS also comes with a comprehensive suite of safety features, including blind-spot monitoring, rear cross-traffic alert, advanced smart city brake support, and adaptive cruise control with stop-and-go functionality. The vehicle's advanced safety technology and solid build quality contribute to its top safety ratings, ensuring peace of mind for both the driver and passengers. Overall, the 2022 Mazda CX-5 GS is an attractive option for those seeking a compact SUV that combines stylish design, a comfortable interior, and engaging driving dynamics, all with the practicality and reliability that Mazda is known for. Priced @ only $31,696! $700 finance credit when financed here through the bank of your choice! 120 POINT MECHANICAL INSPECTION! FRESH OIL SERVICE! 4 WHEEL ALIGNMENT! NEW NS SAFETY STICKER! PROFESSIONALLY DETAILED! CALL OR TEXT ********** NOW FOR YOUR QUICK AND EASY PRE APPROVAL OR TO BOOK YOUR TEST DRIVE! TRURO MAZDA PROMISE At Truro Mazda we treat our customers like family. That is why every single one of our pre-owned vehicles goes through our extensive 120 point mechanical inspection. In addition, we provide EASY FINANCING with guaranteed approvals for every financial situation whether it be perfect credit, bankruptcy, slow payment, collections, etc. We have the GUARANTEED BEST VALUE on all of our vehicles and will DELIVER ANY VEHICLE FREE OF CHARGE ALL OVER ATLANTIC CANADA! Make your next car buying experience an awesome one by calling Truro Mazda NOW at ********** or TEXT ********** available 24 hours a day, seven days a week! We look forward to meeting you! In just 3 short years Truro Mazda has become a major destination for Pre Owned vehicles shoppers in the Central and Northern Nova Scotia area. Come in today to see why our customers love us. "}]

description: [{'description': "The 2016 Mazda CX-5 GT AWD is a compact crossover SUV that combines stylish design, athletic performance, and a host of premium features. Exuding a sleek and modern aesthetic, the CX-5 GT showcases Mazda's KODO: Soul of Motion design philosophy, with its sculpted body lines, bold front grille, and distinctive LED headlights that give it a dynamic and sophisticated presence on the road. Under the hood, the CX-5 GT AWD is powered by a 2.5-liter SKYACTIV-G inline-four engine, producing 184 horsepower and 185 lb-ft of torque. This engine is paired with a six-speed automatic transmission, providing smooth and responsive shifts. The all-wheel-drive system enhances traction and stability, making it well-suited for various driving conditions, from city streets to off-road adventures. Inside, the cabin of the CX-5 GT AWD is both luxurious and functional. High-quality materials, including leather-trimmed seats and soft-touch surfaces, create an upscale atmosphere. The front seats are heated and provide excellent support for long journeys, while the driver's seat features power adjustments and lumbar support for added comfort. The rear seats offer ample space for passengers, and the rear cargo area is versatile, with a 40/20/40 split-folding configuration to accommodate different storage needs. The CX-5 GT AWD is equipped with an array of advanced technology and convenience features. The infotainment system includes a 7-inch touchscreen display with Mazda Connect, offering navigation, Bluetooth connectivity, and a premium Bose audio system with nine speakers for an immersive listening experience. Additional features such as dual-zone automatic climate control, a power moonroof, and a rearview camera enhance the driving experience. Safety is a top priority in the 2016 Mazda CX-5 GT AWD, which comes with a comprehensive suite of safety features. Standard safety equipment includes advanced airbags, anti-lock brakes, and dynamic stability control. The GT trim also adds advanced safety technologies like blind-spot monitoring, rear cross-traffic alert, and smart city brake support, providing an extra layer of protection and peace of mind for drivers and passengers. Overall, the 2016 Mazda CX-5 GT AWD stands out as a well-rounded and appealing option in the compact SUV segment, offering a blend of sporty performance, luxurious comfort, and advanced technology. Whether navigating urban environments or exploring off the beaten path, the CX-5 GT delivers a confident and enjoyable driving experience. [{'description': "NO ACCIDENTS / CLEAN CARFAX / Push Button Start, Steering Wheel Mounted Audio, BT, & Cruise Control, Advanced Blind Spot Monitoring  and more!
 
Clutch is the largest online used car retailer in Canada, delivering a seamless, hassle-free car-buying experience to drivers everywhere. Shop hundreds of used cars online, get the right one delivered to your door, and enjoy peace of mind with our optional 10-Day Money-Back Guarantee. How sweet is that? To learn more, visit clutch.ca.
 
The top features for this 2019 Mazda CX-5 include:
 
Push Button Start
Steering Wheel Mounted Audio
BT
& Cruise Control
Advanced Blind Spot Monitoring
Rear Cross Traffic Alert
7 Touchscreen Display
Air Conditioning
40/20/40 Split Rear Seats
Rearview Camera
 
Seamless home delivery - Delivery anywhere in Nova Scotia, anywhere on PEI, and East of Fredericton, New Brunswick. Available on select packages.
 
Try it out for 10 days - If you do not like it, we will take it back. Available on select packages.
 
Quality assured - Rigorous 210-point inspection and reconditioning process.
 
Peace of mind - Optional 3-month Standard Warranty, with additional warranty options available. Plus, every Clutch car comes with a 2-year MVI.
 
Haggle-free - No haggling or hard sells.
 
100% Transparency - Full inspection reports on every car, including high-res photography and a free Carfax report.
 
Listed price is for cash purchase only and does not include taxes, Shipping Fees (if applicable), Delivery Fees (if applicable), government licensing fees. 10-day Money Back Guarantee, 3-month Standard Warranty, and home delivery are available with select packages.
 
Previous Provincial Registrations:
Nova Scotia
 
Stock # 35771 

Warranty:
This vehicle's manufacturer warranty has expired."}]

FRESH OIL LUBE FILTER, CARSON EXPORTS EXCELLENCE INSPECTION, FRESH 2 YEAR MVI.

Drop by and visit us, take a test drive, have a coffee or our famous hot chocolate, and take a tour of our showrooms at 550 and 560 Windmill Road to view The Carson Collection. We take our professional and legal responsibility very seriously when it comes to ensuring you know all of the options available to you for the financing and protection of your investment.

Reviews:
  * The Mazda CX-5 is highly rated for looking and feeling more expensive than it is. On all elements of styling, handling, and dynamics, owners seem to be impressed. Source: autoTRADER.ca '}]

description:
[{'description': "
The 2021 Mazda CX-5 GX AWD is a compact SUV known for its engaging driving experience, stylish design, and well-crafted interior. Here are the key highlights:
Performance	
Engine: Powered by a 2.5L inline-4 engine, producing around 187 horsepower and 186 lb-ft of torque.
	
Transmission: Comes with a 6-speed automatic transmission that provides smooth and responsive shifts.
	
All-Wheel Drive: The AWD system enhances traction and stability, making it suitable for various weather conditions.
Fuel Economy	
Efficiency: The CX-5 GX AWD offers respectable fuel economy, with estimates around 24 mpg city and 30 mpg highway.
Interior	
Seating: Comfortable seating for up to five passengers, with quality materials and supportive seats.
	
Cargo Space: Offers a versatile cargo area with a split-folding rear seat for added storage options.
Technology	
Infotainment System: Features a 7-inch touchscreen display with Mazda's infotainment system, including Bluetooth connectivity and available navigation.
	
Audio: Typically equipped with a 4-speaker sound system, with options for a premium audio upgrade.
Safety	
Safety Features: Includes a suite of safety technologies such as rearview camera, blind-spot monitoring, and rear cross-traffic alert.
	
Safety Ratings: Generally receives high safety ratings from organizations like the IIHS and NHTSA.
Comfort & Convenience	
Climate Control: Equipped with manual air conditioning, with options for upgraded climate control in higher trims.
	
Wheels: Usually features 17-inch alloy wheels for a balanced ride and sporty appearance.
Additional Features	
Driving Dynamics: Known for its sporty handling and responsive steering, making it enjoyable to drive.
	
Warranty: Mazda offers a competitive warranty for added peace of mind.

Overall, the 2021 Mazda CX-5 GX AWD is a great choice for those looking for a compact SUV that combines performance, style, and practicality. If you have any specific questions or need more details, just let me know!
As a Steele Auto Certified vehicle, you have peace of mind that the vehicle has undergone a rigorous 85 point inspection and has been brought up to the highest of standards. Don't forget, at Steele Volkswagen we have financing options available for all credit situations! "}]
price_analysis: This vehicle is $4,323 BELOW MARKET (15%). It is compared to similar vehicles in the Dartmouth and adjacent area. It’s based on kilometres, year, make, model, trim, manufacturer certification, manufacturer packages, options, and much more.

description: [{'description': "Smith and Watt is a family owned and operated Chrysler, Dodge, Jeep, Ram Dealership located in Barrington Passage offering some of the best service around since 1930's, we have a large stock of new/used inventory with competitive prices on every model on our lot.  We have on spot financing with a wide selection of different banks such as RBC, CIBC, TD, BNS, BMO, Lend Care, Scotia Dealer Advantage, etc. Our Finance manager is highly trained in all credit situations and would love to help you get approved on your next purchase from Smith and Watt Limited. 3 months FREE XM Radio on all pre-owned vehicles, 1 year free on all new vehicles. Also available is extra warranties for all makes and models. Prices listed are finance prices, cash prices are subject to change. We cant guarantee every used vehicle has 2 sets of keys, also keep in mind some used vehicles may have some scrapes small dents and dings, but we take pride in making sure all our vehicles are mechanically sound before leaving the lot to its new home. Book your appointment with us today at ********** or send in a lead and one of our friendly sales staff will get back to you as soon as they can. We offer free fresh coffee and tea along with satellite TV in our waiting room. Take a drive today and check out one of our many beautiful beaches in Barrington passage and stop by our lot along your way. "}]

description: [{'description': "The 2023 Mazda CX-5 Sport Design Turbo AWD embodies the perfect fusion of style, performance, and versatility, setting a new standard in the compact SUV segment. With its sleek and dynamic design, this vehicle captures attention on both urban streets and rugged terrains. At first glance, the exterior of the CX-5 Sport Design Turbo AWD exudes confidence and sophistication. Its bold lines and sculpted curves create a sense of movement even when the vehicle is at a standstill. The signature Mazda grille, adorned with chrome accents, adds a touch of elegance while emphasizing the vehicle's sporty demeanor. LED headlights and taillights provide exceptional visibility and enhance the overall modern aesthetic. Step inside, and you'll find a cabin designed with meticulous attention to detail. Premium materials, such as soft-touch surfaces and available leather upholstery, create an inviting environment for both driver and passengers. The spacious interior offers ample room for five occupants, along with versatile cargo space to accommodate all your gear and belongings. The centerpiece of the CX-5 Sport Design Turbo AWD is its advanced technology features. A user-friendly infotainment system, complete with a touchscreen display, seamlessly integrates with your smartphone through Apple CarPlay and Android Auto, keeping you connected and entertained on every journey. Additionally, an array of driver-assistance features, including adaptive cruise control and lane-keeping assist, provides an extra layer of safety and peace of mind. Under the hood, the CX-5 Sport Design Turbo AWD packs a punch with its turbocharged engine, delivering exhilarating performance and responsive handling. The all-wheel-drive system ensures optimal traction and stability, whether navigating through challenging weather conditions or exploring off-road trails. With its winning combination of style, performance, and technology, the 2023 Mazda CX-5 Sport Design Turbo AWD redefines what it means to drive a compact SUV, offering an unforgettable driving experience that exceeds expectations. Steele Auto Group is one of the most diversified group of automobile dealerships in Canada, with 60 dealerships selling 29 brands and an employee base of well over 2300. Sales are up over last year and our plan going forward is to expand further into Atlantic Canada and the United States furthering our commitment to our Canadian customers as well as welcoming our new customers in the USA.

description: [{'description': "The 2022 Mazda CX-5 Sport Design brings a blend of sophistication and athleticism to the compact SUV segment. With its non-turbocharged engine and all-wheel drive capability, it's engineered to deliver a dynamic driving experience while maintaining efficiency and versatility. Exterior design cues showcase Mazda's signature Kodo design language, characterized by sleek lines and a sense of motion even when standing still. The Sport Design trim adds distinctive touches such as black exterior accents, giving it a sporty and modern appearance that stands out on the road. Step inside, and you're greeted by a thoughtfully crafted interior that prioritizes comfort and functionality. Premium materials and attention to detail create an inviting atmosphere for both driver and passengers. The cabin offers ample space for five occupants and versatile cargo storage options to accommodate various needs, whether it's a weekend getaway or daily commuting. Technological innovation is seamlessly integrated throughout the CX-5 Sport Design. An intuitive infotainment system with a responsive interface provides access to navigation, entertainment, and connectivity features. Advanced safety technologies, including adaptive cruise control, lane departure warning, and automatic emergency braking, offer peace of mind on every journey. Under the hood, the 2.5L engine delivers a balance of power and efficiency, providing smooth acceleration and confident performance in various driving conditions. Paired with Mazda's i-Activ all-wheel drive system, the CX-5 Sport Design ensures optimal traction and stability, whether you're navigating city streets or venturing off the beaten path. Overall, the 2022 Mazda CX-5 Sport Design combines stylish design, advanced technology, and spirited performance to redefine what a compact SUV can be, offering a driving experience that's as exhilarating as it is practical. description:
[{'description': "The 2017 Mazda CX-5 Grand Touring is a well-equipped compact SUV that balances performance, style, and luxury. Key features include:

Engine: 2.5-liter 4-cylinder producing 187 horsepower and 185 lb-ft of torque, paired with a 6-speed automatic transmission.
Fuel Economy: Around 24 mpg city / 31 mpg highway (FWD), with AWD slightly lower.
Interior: Leather upholstery, heated front seats, power-adjustable driver's seat, dual-zone automatic climate control, and a 7-inch infotainment system with navigation and Bose premium audio.
Safety: Advanced features like adaptive cruise control, lane departure warning, lane keep assist, and blind-spot monitoring.
Cargo Space: 30.9 cubic feet, expandable to 59.6 cubic feet with rear seats folded.
Its a good choice for those seeking a balance of sporty driving dynamics and upscale amenities. Do you need more specific details on this model? "}]

description:
[{'description': "
 
Reduced! CX-5 GS AWD withApple CarPlay,Heated Seats andKeyless Entry + Start!
 
Experience the thrill of driving with this 2022 Mazda CX-5 GS AWD, featuring a 2.5L 4-cylinder engine and an automatic transmission. This vehicle delivers a balanced and responsive performance, with its all-wheel-drive system ensuring enhanced traction and stability in various driving conditions. The CX-5's engine provides a smooth and efficient ride, making it an excellent choice for both urban and adventurous drives.
 
Step inside to discover a cabin designed for comfort and convenience. The CX-5 GS AWD boasts a spacious interior with high-quality materials, providing a luxurious feel for both driver and passengers. The supportive seats and well-organized controls ensure a comfortable ride, while the generous cargo space accommodates all your gear and belongings with ease.
 
This 2022 Mazda CX-5 GS AWD combines dynamic performance with a refined interior and sleek blue exterior. With only 29,324 kilometers, it is in excellent condition and ready to deliver a high-quality driving experience. This SUV offers a perfect blend of style, comfort, and capability for your everyday and adventure needs.
 
Only $31,690 or $133/Wk Tax Inc $0 Down! Email ********** for more info!
 
All ReCar Certified Vehicles come with our 360 degree inspection which is a very meticulous and comprehensive 170 point mechanical and cosmetic inspection and is backed by our 12 month ReCar Certified Guarantee FREE of charge! For added convenience and peace of mind, we offer a 7 day test drive which means within the first 7 days of ownership, if you are unhappy with the vehicle or feel you made the wrong selection, you may bring it back to ReCar and exchange it for a different vehicle in stock. This Certified vehicle comes with a Brand new NB MVI sticker on it, fresh oil and filter change and complimentary CarFax vehicle history report. Our Certified vehicles also get the Guaranteed Best Interest rates and we offer Customer focused Fixed, No Pressure Pricing. Our Non Commissioned vehicle advisors also offer test drives to your door on our Certified vehicles!
 
Fast, Flexible Financing for Everyone  We work with over 16 lenders; not only to get you the best possible rates but to also provide you with the best possible terms, regardless of your credit situation. No Obligation Pre-Approvals within 2 hours from the Comfort of Your Home!! Apply Online @ **********
 

 
It is the purchaser's responsibility to personally verify the year, make, model, mileage, options and any remaining or extended warranty prior to purchasing this vehicle. Although many of our ReCar Certified vehicles have multiple sets of keys, a minimum of 1 key can be guaranteed with our ReCar Certified vehicles. "}]

[{'description': 'NO ACCIDENTS / CLEAN CARFAX / 1 OWNER / Apple CarPlay & Android Auto, Drive Mode Select, Steering Wheel Mounted Controls and more!
 
Clutch is the largest online used car retailer in Canada, delivering a seamless, hassle-free car-buying experience to drivers everywhere. Shop hundreds of used cars online, get the right one delivered to your door, and enjoy peace of mind with our optional 10-Day Money-Back Guarantee. How sweet is that? To learn more, visit clutch.ca.
 
The top features for this 2024 Mazda CX-5 include:
 
Apple CarPlay & Android Auto
Drive Mode Select
Steering Wheel Mounted Controls
Rearview Camera
Power Adjust Rear View Mirror
A/C
Heated Front Seats
Cruise Control
 
Seamless home delivery - Delivery anywhere in Nova Scotia, anywhere on PEI, and East of Fredericton, New Brunswick. Available on select packages.
 
Try it out for 10 days - If you do not like it, we will take it back. Available on select packages.
 
Quality assured - Rigorous 210-point inspection and reconditioning process.
 
Peace of mind - Optional 3-month Standard Warranty, with additional warranty options available. Plus, every Clutch car comes with a 2-year MVI.
 
Haggle-free - No haggling or hard sells.
 
100% Transparency - Full inspection reports on every car, including high-res photography and a free Carfax report.
 
Listed price is for cash purchase only and does not include taxes, Shipping Fees (if applicable), Delivery Fees (if applicable), government licensing fees. 10-day Money Back Guarantee, 3-month Standard Warranty, and home delivery are available with select packages.
 
Previous Provincial Registrations:
Nova Scotia
 
Stock # 36177 

Warranty:
This vehicle has only 32 months and unlimited kilometres of warranty left.'}]
